title: Let me out
creator_credit: Kiar Eegan, Gregg Torkington and Stuart Griffiths
brief_description: A montage of animated images that describe a city without hope filled with loneliness, prostitutes and desperate people. But, is the situation really that bad? Animated and produced by the team: Kiar Eegan, Gregg Torkington and Stuart Griffiths.
